mapper.update: update sys_resource set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon_cls = #{iconCls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, status, modify_time, version, code, icon_cls, name, order_no, type, url, parent_id from sys_resource where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
